name: Women's Lightweight Waterproof Long Softshell Tactical Jacket Fleece Lined Windbreaker
description:
‚≠êLightweight&Feminine Cut: Slim fit has a modern cut.Falls at midthigh.with a pull cord if you'd like to taper around your waist area and have a bit of a shape show.The drawstring creates waist and flattering shape.This lightweight insulated fall jacket keeps garments packable&easy to stuff in backpacks and luggage (Tips:Women's jackets are loose fit, please refer to the last size chart before purchasing)
‚≠êWindproof Warm Jacket: The tight weave and water-repellent durable fabric.Lined with polar fleece to be extra soft and skin-friendly.The length keep me plenty warm and comfortable.Blocks the wind and isn't too warm while being active.This softshell long jacket with reflective strip detachable hood(keep you well protected in rainy and windy dayÔºâ
‚≠êAll-weather Waterproof Jacket: DWR(Durable Water Resistant) treated softshell exterior offers windproof performance while maintaining breathable comfort and repels light rain,moisture and snowflake.Ladies softshell tactical windbreaker features our durable water and wind resistant shell to keep the elements out while keeping you dry and warm.With 3000mm/H2O waterproof index.Built-in high permeability film contribute significantly to waterproof
‚≠êPractical Features: Hideaway drawcord adjustable waist offer a better fit and fashion stylish.Zip-through cadet collar with chin guard.Loop&hook adjustable cuffs.5 Pockets design-1 chest zippered pocket.2 large zipped front pockets and 2(one on each side) huge (2.7in x 10in) inside pockets where you can keep valuables dry.Allows you to exercise freely without worrying about items falling
‚≠êOccasion: The transition from Winter/Spring and Fall/Winter jacket.This casual lightweight warm fleece lined jacket is the great choice for casual daily work wear,military army outdoor, outdoor sports, snowboarding,skiing,mountaineering,skating,traveling,camping,hiking,cycling,climbing,fishing,riding,hunting, travelling and adventure.This stylish and functional Outwear should accompany you when you are out adventure and on your daily commute

reviews.content: Made with precision and to perfection. The magenta color is perfect, lining soft and cuddling. Sturdy on the outside and soft and flexible on the inside. However the 2XX size is more like 1XX. I can barely zip it up.

This is a nice lightweight jacket for those days when you need something more than a sweater but not a heavy coat. Plenty of pockets on both the inside and outside of the jacket, which is nice for those of us who commute on foot.

But the zipper...I wore it for the first time today on a longer walk and after half a mile the zipper had managed to work itself into a weird state where the two sides no longer aligned. I was afraid I was going to have the break the zipper to get out of the jacket, luckily I didn't but I wore it unzipped for the rest of the walk.

Overall it's fine for what I need, I'd suggest maybe going up a size or two to avoid the zipper issue

This coat is perfect! Not real warm, but just right for those 40 degree temperatures. I wear a size medium shirt and ordered a large for the jacket and it fits just as I had hoped. The sleeves are a little long but workable! It‚Äôs a light fleece inner lining, but it‚Äôs perfect for what I needed!

Unfortunately I had to return this jacket. I loved the pockets and the look of it but even though I followed their measurement charts it was too tight across the chest and hips for me. While I could get the jacket on, it was definitely snug and would have been uncomfortable to wear while doing much of anything. I was afraid to sit down in it as I didn't want to bust the zipper. Otherwise I really liked the jacket so I gave it 4 stars for the measuring chart inaccuracies.

name: Raincoat Women Waterproof Long Hooded Trench Coats Lined Windbreaker Travel Jacket S-XXL
description:
Material:98% Polyester, 2% Spandex,100% Waterproof material with striped cotton lined, Breathable, Soft touch,Windproof, Easy to package
Design:This Women Rain Jacket with attached hood, drawstring waist design.solid pattern,Sun Protection and Waterproof Function,Breathable, Skin-touch, Quick-drying, Lightweight casual fit, front pocket decoration, Suitable for all seasons.
Occasion:Suitable for your hiking,climbing,traveling,camping,sport outdoor,easy to quick-drying when it is light rain or snow and wind.
Size:Please check our SIZE CHART image in the Left or detailed size info below in product description carefully.If you have any question about size,just contact to us,we'll try our best to help you get a wonderful shopping experience
Garment Care: We recommend you Washing by Hand or machine wash, Dry Clean, Do not iron, to Protect waterproof material performance

reviews.content: I ordered an XL. Reviews I looked at before were kind of all over the place. Jacket didn't come with weird smell. It's light, but warm. Has a draw string around the waist to help shape. Has buttons and a zipper. Im able to zip with ease, not to tight in any given place. It fits me perfectly, but I definitely won't be able to throw it over a hoody, as some people were mentioning. I have wide shoulders and it fits comfortably, but there is no extra room there. The rest is pretty spacey in a good way. So if you want to wear a hoody under this jacket, size up. I'm used to a cool, wet climate, so a lighter waterproof, fleece lined jacket works perfect for me. I needed something for daily errands and running the kids to and from school and this jacket hit every need for me. 10/10 recommend. It's my new favorite jacket.

I bought this raincoat because I am so tired of wearing black all the time and needed some color in my life. It is a nice raincoat, it has a lot of wrinkles and I don‚Äôt know how to get them out because you can‚Äôt put it in the dryer and you obviously can‚Äôt iron it, so I‚Äôm hoping that as it hangs in my closet, the wrinkles will eventually fall out. I haven‚Äôt worn it yet because it‚Äôs too cold, but as soon as we get one of those warmer January days with rain I‚Äôm gonna give it a shot. It‚Äôs so cute I may end up getting it in another color.

Was skeptical when I took it out of the package, and it had a chemical smell and was wrinkled. So I almost returned it. However, I put it in the dryer on low with a bounce sheet, wore it and the smell/wrinkles no longer a problem. I like the lining - adds some style. I am small/petite and have to roll up the sleeves, so the print lining looks good. I also like the tie in order to pull in the waist, yet there is room enough for me to wear a sweater or something underneath. Let's see how it holds up after wearing a bit.

Perfect for walking the dog on cool drizzly spring days. Lining is lightweight. I usually have a hard time finding jackets that fit my boobs as Im a 38DD and 225 lbs. the large was perfect! Highly recommend.

name: Women's Double Breasted Trench Coats Mid-Length Belted Overcoat Long Dress Jacket with Detachable Hood
description:
‚ù§ Anti-wrinkle & Lightweight fabric: Adopts breathable and water-repellent fabric, combined with densely woven twill structure, made special anti-static and anti-pilling treatments, makes this ladies dresscoat lightweight and breathable, soft, anti-wrinkle and skin-friendly, bringing great comfort.
‚ù§ Classic versatile style: As a classic women's double-breasted trench coat, it can be matched with T-shirts or hoodies at will, comfortable and casual. The mid-length design can also be used as a casual business wear, with a tear-resistant lining, which highlights the sense of luxury.
‚ù§ Removable hood & Practical pockets: Specially designed detachable hood, which can be used as a Practical raincoat. 2 side hand pockets can hold small objects, such as keys, cards, etc., and the inner pocket can hold a mobile phone.
‚ù§ Temperament lapel & Belt: Classic lapel design, with a golden ratio belt, it can not only highlight the figure but also show the women's capable business style. It shows a casual and relaxed style without a belt. High-quality resin buttons and belt buckles are different from ordinary windbreakers, it can better reflect the texture of the overcoat.
‚ù§ Occasion & Customer service: This women's dress coat is perfect for daily wear, business, trip, outings, pictures, girls' gatherings, etc. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.

reviews.content:
So..I‚Äôm trying to figure out what I should talk about first.
Ok. Size ref, I‚Äôm 5‚Äô3‚Äù and size 8-10. I ordered Large and it fits perfectly. However if you plan to layer up, I would go XL in size. Reason: when I stretched my arms in front of me, there‚Äôs not much give. So with the large, don‚Äôt plan on using anything thick underneath.

Color: not the navy blue I expected it to be. It‚Äôs like a dull navy blue. Borderline ‚Äúblue‚Äù in the color spectrum. I minus a star because of the color

Length: PERFECT! Just hits right above my knees.

Quality: material doesn‚Äôt feel cheap. It‚Äôs lined so I know it‚Äôll keep my inside clothes dry on those rainy days and I feel it would keep me warm too. The weight of it is as expected a rain trench coat should be.

Get it. You won‚Äôt be disappointed

This jacket is okay. Not overly excited or disappointed. Was probably expecting a little better quality. But again not falling apart or anything like that. I do not feel it should cost as much as it does for the product you get. The price needs to be $10-$15 lower. However, it is not a name brand product that I purchased. However order and see what you think for yourself.
VERY flattering and great fit! Nice material and I like that it is water resistant. It is not a heavy duty coat (does not claim to be one) so keep that in mind.

I had to send back and reorder because it runs small. I ordered a Medium because I am between a size 8-10 petite. I couldnt button it and it was tight and short. Other than that, I loved that it wasnt too thick, yet not so light that it wasnt warm. It felt quality. The color was very pretty too. I like the variety of colors. If the large comes and fits I do plan to order another color.

name: Women's Plus Size Double-Breasted Trench Coat Water-Repellent Classic Lapel Overcoat Stylish Pea Coat with Belt
description:
Big is Beautiful - This plus size trench coat for women are made available in different modern and stunning colors. Choose from size 1X to 5X to ensure a custom, comfy, and figure-flattering fit, and show off your classic taste in clothing from this women's trench dress coat.
100% Recycled Water Repellent Fabric - Our women's trench coats are made with recycled polyester, which requires far fewer resources than new fibers and generates fewer CO2 emissions. The shell fabric with 3,000mm waterproof rating effectively keeps out light rain. This women‚Äôs elegant raincoat has a thick shell outer layer that provides additional warmth.
Feel Cozy and Confidence - Whether it's winter or autumn, the plus size spring trench coat for women is sure to keep you warm and comfy. Each classic dress coat also has a double-breasted closure to shield you from strong winds.
A Functional Wear - The polyester fabric of this windproof long jacket also withstands wrinkles. Complete with a removable belt and adjustable cuffs, you can style this ladies dress coat in multiple ways. Our women's waterproof overcoat also has 2 deep pockets that you can use to store your essentials.
Pair with Any Outfit - Wear these long coats for women with your jeans, shorts, dress, or suits in spring, fall or winter for a chic look. You can wear it straight to work or party!

reviews.content: I normally wear an XL or XXL, I ordered 3XL and it fit fine. It is a little cheap and thin looking, I thought it would look nicer, but you get what you pay for. It‚Äôs doable üôÉ
Gifted this to the wife and she loves it. It's a lightweight jacket
Looks great on my girlfriend and she is happy that's all that matters
I love the cut and the fabric of this jacket. It is lightweight. The only problem is the actual fit. I will be exchanging it for 1 size up.

name: Women's Trench Coats Double-Breasted Long Coat with Belt
description:
Comfy Material - 100% Polyester. Lining: 100% Cotton. Women trench coats maded of high quality material, soft And comfortable.
Attractive Design - This trench coat features double breasted closure and removable belt, 2 side pockets could carry your neccesary items such as mobile phone, key, or cards. Thigh length and fully lined design offer windproof protection.
Stylish Fit - The long trench coat features slim waist, with flare swing for a versatile look and fit, popular and fashion.
Diverse Wearing Options - A Beautiful Season Transition Trench Coat - It Is an attractive and functional trench coat for Spring, Autumn and Winter Weather. Perfect for any occasions - office, work, vacation, school, casual, formal, party, and etc.
Size and Care Instruction - Please read the SIZE CHART we provide in the description. Both hand and machine wash, Hand wash recommendation.

reviews.content: Nice lightweight trench coat. The fit was good and details were nice. It has a bit of sheen to the fabric which I didn‚Äôt think I‚Äôd like, but in the navy color it looked ok. This is not a rain coat: I don‚Äôt feel it would repel water well at all, but for a formal night out, it‚Äôs a nice dressy coat. I wore it in 42 degree weather and it was fine altho I was only outside in it for about 30 minutes. The fit was nice with a good amount of stretch, the sleeves were the perfect length (often too short on me as I have long arms for my height), the bottom length hit me at about mid shin but I am short (5‚Äô2‚Äù 135) but with the flared style and a 3.5 heel, the look was very flattering, a little 50‚Äôs retro almost, but in a good way. There was a little bit of excess lining material on the inside, but it didn‚Äôt hang below the hem, so that‚Äôs ok. I did have to give it a really good all-over steaming out of the package as it was really wrinkled: I would Not recommend ironing: I feel this material would melt or darken where the hot iron hits it, and directions say not to put in the dryer. And you can‚Äôt beat the low price. Overall, I was very satisfied and would recommend.

I ordered this to wear over my lingerie and it is PERFECT! Super sexy for what I wanted it for but dressy that I could wear it for a night out. I love this! I am 5‚Äù7 230lbs and normally wear a xl but ordered an xxl and it was perfect! Hope this review helps someone!

I used this jacket for my Carmen Sandiego costume and it worked perfectly. People were surprised that my costume also felt like normal clothes and not like an over the top costume, and I told them it was because it WAS a great normal jacket off of Amazon. Got lots of compliments and this kept me warm while trick it treating with my nieces.

Love the color! I was hoping for something a bit heavier for the price but it‚Äôs cute all the same. Definitely would work for southern winters. Will look good with most clothes although with a short skirt it might look awkward since the jacket is long.

name: Women's Fashion Faux Fur Lapel Double-Breasted Thick Wool Trench Coat Jacket
description:
Women's pea coat go for a sleek look and wear over a slim fit top and bottom to show a more feminine silhouette
High quality faux fur coat, soft, comfortable and super warm lining and unique design. Winter Overcoat, classic and simple, create stunning curves, makes you more beautiful, fashion and elegant
Unique design: This dress coat has a fitted horn shape, type A skirt,lapel, double Breasted, hidden pockets, adjustable waistband, and front double buttons and buttons on the cuffs and back.You will look amazing and temperamental by the final shape of the warm coat when you put it on. The most important is that the coat could help you to show thin effect more apparent
This women winter coat are suitable to wear in casual, date, outdoor and other occasions.It is suggest to wear with leggings, boots for winter casual looks
Garment Care: Hand wash or dry clean, low temperature for washing.

reviews.content:
This coat is super cute and flattering! I've gotten a lot of compliments when I've worn it. I bought the brown in a medium. I was a little nervous about the shoulder width before I got it because of the measurements they give, thinking maybe I should have bought a large. The medium actually fits perfect and I usually buy a large jacket. It was warm enough for me in 30 degree weather with a thin sweater underneath, but I didn't stay outside for a long period of time. Love that it has pockets too!
I wouldn't say the material stretches, so read the reviews to help you pick the correct size. I'm a little curvier and I love the fit!! The only negative I would mention is there is only one belt loop in the back of the coat. So if it is unbuttoned and the belt is not tied, I had to tuck the belt ends in the pockets so it wouldn't drag behind me. Besides that one negative, I would definitely recommend it!!

I got this not expecting a lot from the reviews, but I was so happy when I received it! It‚Äôs a very bright red, fits a bit large but the belt gives that nice waistline feature. I‚Äôve been complimented so much when I wear it. The skirt feature adds to that nice detail and will give any woman that nice figured shape!

Overall I LOVE this jacket! There are a couple things to keep in mind though. There is only 1 belt loop at the lower back. I wish there were one at each side of the waist sides. Also the sleeve length is a little short, so if you have long arms, this may not work well for you. Last, when you tie the belt around your waist, the space between buttons and your chest (like me, having a larger chest) is not much surface area so you have to hike the belt up high. Lastly, the side pockets in the folds are hard to find when you're out & about. It takes a moment. Overall though, it looks amazing on, accentuates your waist and is very flattering and pretty warm too!!! I wore it on the single digit cold Christmas Chicago day and it kept me warm! (Body type: 5'7" 152lbs, 36DD, got a size Large)

I bought this jacket recently and was a little skeptical based on some of the reviews, but it's actually very cute and seems well made. I've only been wearing it for a few days, but I've already gotten a ton of compliments. I got the baby blue color and it's really pretty in person. The material is decent, the buttons seem to be sewn on well, and the pockets, though hard to find sometimes, are a good size. I definitely do not regret my purchase. Though, I do recommend, if you have a larger chest, order a size up because the buttons close right underneath the bust line and it can be tight, especially after a large meal. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because, like others have mentioned, there's only 1 loop for the belt and it's in the back, so you have to keep the belt tied otherwise it will drag on the ground (unless you're a tall person).

name: Women's Drape Front Open Cardigan Long Sleeve

Made In USA

reviews.content: This product color is great the light weight material is thinner than expected!!! Flowy but yet clingy!!!

For the price, this was a great buy. Very lightweight. Perfect for summer days when you just need a light cover. Stitching on the sleeves was a little out of alignment, but for the low price the quality of the sweater is not bad. I‚Äôve worn and washed it many times now and it is standing up to all the wear. I get a lot of compliments on the soft coral color!

This sweater jacket fits exactly as I hoped. Very flattering loose fit with just the right amount of stretch, sleeves not tight in the arms. Can easily be dressed up and long enough to cover all the right parts. Definitely recommend and will be buying other colors.

reviews.content: This jacket looks amazing in person. One of the best looking we have purchased in a long time. The only negative is that it runs small and I mean really small. There is not a coat in my wife‚Äôs closet that is larger than a size Large. And every one of those jackets are huge on her. We bought a large and couldn‚Äôt even get it to meet to even think of zipping it up. We returned it and got an XL, it can be zipped up but is VERY tight. First XL anything she has ever had to buy. Runs very small but man it looks good.

I‚Äôm 5‚Äô10‚Äù and 200 lbs. I bought the XL size initially. Looks very nice and the fabric/faux leather is beautiful. Five stars for the materials used. However, it was too small to even try to zip up. I can wear it as long as it‚Äôs not too cold. I then tried to buy a XXL thinking it would work for me. Still too small! Sad I have to return it and they don‚Äôt make anything bigger. For reference, I usually wear a L/XL. Gave the jacket 4 stars now. I would definitely suggest sizing up!

I ordered an XX Large because reviews indicated that it ran a bit small. I have a larger chest but smaller waist so I was concerned that it wouldn‚Äôt zip up because I‚Äôve had that problem before with other similar jackets. But it zipped up and I was able to breath. It‚Äôs very figure flattering and emphasizes my curves. Could be a bit warmer but that‚Äôs okay. With a long sleeve and a scarf I was warm enough.

name: Womens Fashion Horn Button Fleece Thicken Coat with Hood Winter Warm Jacket
description:
Soft and comfy fabric, medium weight, it seems very warm, do not wrinkle, do not shrink. About Size: Small=US 2-4, Medium=US 5-6, Large=US 8-10, X-Large=US 12-14,XX-Large=US 16-18
Zipper and button closure, double warmth, hooded collar and fleece lining keeps wind and warm
Unique double-row horn buckle placket design and fit tailoring, fashionable and cute, highlighting your charming figure
Two large square front pockets, you can put keys, mobile phones and other small objects, providing a warm place for your hands in the cold morning
Women's winter leisure hooded horn buckle wool pea coat jacket can keep you warm and comfortable in the cold winter, suitable for all occasions.

reviews.content:
I wanted a jacket to replace a coat I have. My coat just doesn't fit properly anymore, but I haven't found anything of the same style to replace it. I needed a quick on/off jacket with a hood that would work for fall and spring when our weather is incredibly changeable.
For the price, I expected this jacket to be on the lower side of quality, but I have been pleasantly surprised! It's also far warmer than I expected! I live in an area with mildly-hot (90¬∞F or so) summers and potentially frigid (below 0¬∞F is not uncommon) winters. I've discovered that I get too hot in this jacket, quickly, if the temp is above 50¬∞F. It's very cute!
I ordered my usual size, and it's a bit larger than expected. Thankfully, for jackets, I prefer to err on the side of "too big." I also love having long arms that cover part of my hand! That's uncommon for me as my arms are longer than average for my height.
It‚Äôs a nice coat but not lightweight to me. I didn‚Äôt like the grey color, it‚Äôs a very light grey.

I ordered the light gray jacket XXl. The outside material is a jersey knit and lined with a faux fleece. The jacket is very cute and the quality seems to be great. Yes, it was wrinkled when I removed it from the packaging. I just shook it out and missed the wrinkles, it was just fine. You could always wash it on a gentle cycle and then hang to dry if you chose to. I did order a size up for more room if I wore sweaters. It is just a jacket not a heavy winter coat. But should suffice just fine in 20 - 30 degree weather. I don't understand why the bad reviews. I think the jacket is just fine and exactly what was expected. I would certainly buy again and would recommend to anyone questioning whether to purchase. I love this little jacket.

name: Women's Lightweight Full Zip Soft Polar Fleece Jacket Outdoor Recreation Coat With Zipper Pockets
description:
SOFT FABRIC: This polar fleece jacket is crafted of ultra-soft 100% polyester microfleece for the perfect amount of Comfort.
ULTIMATE COMFORT: With a stand collar style designand full zippered closure,you'll maintain a full range of motion with this lightweight soft fleece jacket.
VERSATILITY: Soft and warm, the microfleece material is the perfect outer or extra mid layer warmth for various occasions,it is the perfect layer for everyday casual wear and outdoor sports.
CLASSIC FIT: A modern classic fit and with a soft, lightweight feel and two zippered hand pockets make this fleece jacket a staple for comfortable outdoor activity.
DURABILITY: Gimecen‚Äôs attention to detail is what sets our apparel apart. Specifying only the highest quality materials, expert stitching and craftsmanship. This is a long-lasting garment you will enjoy for seasons to come.

reviews.content: This jacket is soft and comfortable. I got a large because I prefer bigger jackets on me even though I fit a medium. I feel like I should have gotten an XL just because I thought the large would have been as big as I wanted it to be but I still love it nonetheless. I had one similar years ago when I lost it and never saw it again. I‚Äôm so happy to have one again because it was my favorite. And now it still is.

I purchased multiple colors after receiving the first one. It washes well in cold water, dry for few minutes, hang to dry. I am wearing indoors over a long sleeve shirt due to conserving energy. I'm 5'4" 120 lbs and small fits perfectly. Very happy.
I love it, it‚Äôs warm and does the job. I work night shift as an RN and I can keep it on most of the night. Very comfortable and warm but not too warm.
